name: Cycling ChauDoc - CaoLanh - CanTho - Saigon 3Days
description: Cycling ChauDoc to Ho Chi Minh. Visit the house of THE LOVER in Sadec town. Cycle past the flower plantation in countryside of Sadec and spend the night in Cao Lanh city. On weekends, a lively farmer’s market takes place just a few blocks from our hotel, selling everything from fish to fresh cut flowers. This bicycle trip will take you to water chestnut fields as you cycling past lotus fields and flower gardens. Road surfaces: bumpy rural roads, concrete roads and paths.
